select * from ( select
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PM.pay_no desc) as RN ,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PM.pay_no asc) as RN ,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PM.pay_price desc) as RN ,
PM.pay_no as payNo , O.order_no as orderNo , O.order_number as orderNum , OP.order_prod_no as orderProdNo , PM.pay_type as payType , U.user_name as userName , U.user_id as userId , U.user_tel as userTel , PM.pay_price as payPrice , PM.pay_status as payStatus , PM.pay_method as payMethod , P.prod_name as prodName , PS.prod_size as prodSize , OP.order_prod_amount as orderProdAmount , PM.pay_date as payDate from ORDERS O JOIN PAYMENTS PM ON O.pay_no = PM.pay_no JOIN USERS U ON O.user_no = U.user_no JOIN ORDER_PRODUCTS OP ON O.order_no = OP.order_no JOIN PRODUCTS P ON OP.prod_no = P.prod_no JOIN PROD_SIZES PS ON OP.size_no = PS.size_no where pay_type = '상품'
and ( DATE_FORMAT(PM.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{condition.day} or DATE_FORMAT(PM.pay_date, '%Y-%m') = #{condition.day} )
and P.pay_status = '결제완료'
and P.pay_status = '취소'
and U.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition.value},'%')
and U.user_id like CONCAT('%',#{condition.value},'%')
) as subquery

and ( DATE_FORMAT(PM.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{condition.day} or DATE_FORMAT(PM.pay_date, '%Y-%m') = #{condition.day} )
